title: ALWAYS
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2T8asWh

by superpowergirl999

This fanfiction is about a woman named,Amelía Swan,who started out as student at Hogwarts School for Witchcraft and Wizardry like all the witches and wizards before her. Who might have fallen for her dark and alluring Potions master,Professor Snape. Little does she know about Severus’s dark secrets. The story takes place some years before the events of Harry Potter and then gradually works into the events of Harry Potter.

Words: 764, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: F/M

  • Relationships: Severus Snape/Original Female Character(s), James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley, Remus Lupin/Nymphadora Tonks

blog.name: merula-snyde
blog.title: MERULA SNYDE
blog.description: Independent Merula Snyde ROLEPLAY BLOG! Please don’t follow if you get upset by darker content. NO NSFW ALLOWED.

summary: What did you think of Molly Weasley?
question: What did you think of Molly Weasley?
answer:
She has way too many filthy kids. How can anyone have this many?! My Father was fed up with having one.

But I suppose she’s nice enough. I‘m not surprised the Weasleys are all such wimps, with how much she dotes on everyone.

reblog.comment:

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

tags: fantastic beats and where to find them
summary: Alright so I just wonder if there's any royal family member that carry magical blood and recieved a letter from Hogwarts. If...
body: Alright so I just wonder if there’s any royal family member that carry magical blood and recieved a letter from Hogwarts. If yes, do they sent their children to Hogwarts or ignore the letter completely thinking it was some troll? Does it mean wizarding world isn’t completely hidden after all and the royal family have the knowledge about it? Does the ministry of magic ever try to contact or make an agreement with muggle ministry or the royal family themselves? I need answer.

blog.title: I'm here
blog.description: |pro:NH & SI|active HP:HM player| English is not my native language🇸🇰| I am Anti Snape, SS, Sakura| Pro Tony Stark/Iron Man
